segments.text: I notice the girl standing next to the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems quite patient, her hand outstretched, anticipating a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing her wait like that, hoping for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is risking a fall just to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are both being quite brave, trying to get cookies without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit nostalgic, remembering my own childhood adventures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's posture is attentive and expectant, as if she's been waiting for a while.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they will get caught or if they will succeed in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get into trouble, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene reminds me of the innocence and daring of childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the artist captured the essence of childhood perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR
